title: Communications Specialist
description:
About D2 International:

For over 30 years, D2 International Pvt. Ltd. has partnered with leading global luxury brands, specializing in premium leather handbags, accessories, and belts. With a strong focus on innovation, quality, and compliance, we are expanding our team to welcome high-potential talent from diverse industries into the world of international fashion and luxury merchandising.




Who We’re Looking For:

We invite ambitious professionals with from across industries who are eager to transition into global merchandising and product development. Prior experience in fashion/leather is not mandatory — what matters is your analytical mindset, business acumen, and passion to learn.




Key Responsibilities

Order Management

 * Manage the end-to-end order lifecycle, from initial customer inquiry to final shipment.
 * Coordinate with cross-functional teams to track workflow, obtain necessary approvals, and ensure adherence to defined timelines.




Communication & Coordination

 * Maintain clear, timely, and professional communication with international buyers, vendors, and internal stakeholders.
 * Follow up on materials, approvals, sampling, and other critical project milestones.
 * Prepare professional emails, reports, and regular status updates for both internal and external stakeholders.




Data Management & Documentation

 * Maintain and update production trackers, order sheets, status reports, and shipping documentation.
 * Organize and manage records related to costing, sourcing, sampling, and other operational processes.




Qualifications & Eligibility

 * Experience: Open to Experienced professionals or Freshers.
 * For experienced candidates, mandatory exposure to Manufacturing environments, preferably in a B2B business model.
 * Compensation: CTC up to ₹20,000 – ₹21,000 per month (maximum).
 * Education:
 * Schooling from ICSE / CBSE / other recognized boards (English Medium only)
 * Graduation/Post-graduation in B.A. (English / Mass Communication) / BBA / MBA / B.Tech
 * Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills with strong command over English.
 * Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
 * Ability to manage multiple orders, timelines, and stakeholder relationships.
 * Demonstrated interest in luxury, fashion, manufacturing, and global trade.
 * Willingness to learn industry-specific practices and apply knowledge to drive operational excellence.




Why Join Us?

 * Work with prestigious international brands and global markets.
 * A chance to transition into the luxury/fashion industry with structured training and mentorship.
 * Exposure to end-to-end product lifecycle, from design to delivery.
 * Growth-focused environment with opportunities to build a long-term career in global merchandising.




✨ If you are ready to step into the world of global fashion, luxury exports, and international business, this could be the opportunity you’ve been waiting for.

title: Sales Manager-Consumer Durable Loan Open Market
description:
Job Requirements

Job Description

Job Title – Sales Manager- Consumer Durable Loan

Place of work – Mumbai

Business Unit – Retail Banking

Function – Retail Banking

Job Purpose

The role entails direct customer interaction and is responsible for acquisition of Consumer Durable loan customers for a designated branch. It will also entail explaining and selling banking products to customers and acting as a link between customers and bank - ensuring best in-class service to the customers. The role bearer has a responsibility to supervise catchment mapping, customer feedback and identifying and converting potential opportunities. The role bearer is responsible for driving client acquisition, deepening customer relationships and capitalizing on lifetime value in each relationship to achieve larger organizational goals.

[

Roles & Responsibilities


 * Acquisition of Consumer Durable loan customers in the identified segment
 * Meet and exceed the defined targets of new customer acquisitions month on month by analyzing transaction banking needs of the customer
 * Provide regular feedback to RM on opportunities and customer needs
 * Ensure adherence to selling norms and SOPs defined by the organization
 * Ensure strict compliance with internal guidelines and external regulations
 * Ensure quality sourcing in line with the Bank's policy
   
   

Educational Qualifications

Graduate – Any discipline

Post Graduate – Any discipline

Experience: Minimum of 1+ years of experience in Sales.

title: Site Supervisor
description:
Company Description

At Konecranes, we believe that great customer experience is built on the people behind the Konecranes name. Everything we do, we do with passion and drive. We believe diversity drives business success and is the foundation for our growth. We welcome different backgrounds and skills that enrich our community and we promote a place where we can ALL be ourselves. This is what makes Konecranes a unique place to work.

Job Description

Summary of position:

We are looking for a self-starter Specialist to deliver the desired customer service experience. The goal is to drive service success that improves customer satisfaction, maximizes customer retention and increases profitability.

Duties and Responsibilities:


 * Provide service and customer support during field visits or dispatches
 * Tie workflow to schedule
 * Manage all on site installation, repair, maintenance, and test tasks
 * Diagnose errors or technical problems and determine proper solutions
 * Produce timely and detailed service reports
 * Document processes
 * Operate vehicle in a safely manner and use field automation systems
 * Follow all company’s filed procedures and protocols
 * Cooperate with technical team and share information across the organization
 * Comprehend customer requirements and make appropriate recommendations/briefings
 * Build positive relationships with customers
 * Awareness of ISO 14001 and 45001 standards
   
   

Qualifications

Requirements and Skills:


 * Proven Field Service experience
 * Ability to troubleshoot, test, repair and service technical equipment
 * English literacy
 * Ability to work flexible shifts and to adapt to changing work schedules
 * Familiarity with mobile tools and applications
 * Technical degree or certification
   
   

Additional Information

Konecranes moves what matters. We are a global leader in material handling solutions, serving a broad range of customers across multiple industries. We consistently set the industry benchmark, from everyday improvements to the breakthroughs at moments that matter most, because we know we can always find a safer, more productive and sustainable way. That's why, with 16 000+ professionals in over 50 countries, we are trusted every day to lift, handle and move what the world needs.

Konecranes is committed to ensuring that all employees and job applicants are treated fairly in an environment which is free from any form of discrimination.

title: Human Resources (HR) Associate in Kolkata
description:
About Us

At Framed, we believe in stories—not just capturing them, but building one of our own. From wedding memoirs and studio portraits to brand campaigns and commercial content, we operate at the intersection of art and business. The Founder’s Office sits at the heart of this vision, working across people, process, and possibilities to ensure our mission moves forward.

We are looking for a passionate, detail-oriented, and mission-driven Associate to join the founder’s office—a dynamic, generalist role that offers unmatched exposure across departments and decision-making.

Links


 * Framed Memoirs - instagram.com/framed.memoirs | website - www.framedmemoirs.in
 * Framed Productions - instagram.com/productions.framed | Website - www.framedproductions.in
 * Framed Studio - instagram.com/theframedstudio | Website - www.theframedstudio.in
   
   

What You’ll Be Doing


 * Administration & operations:
 * Maintain founder schedules, coordinate travel, events, and internal meetings
 * Ensure smooth day-to-day studio administration
 * Help document internal processes and track team deliverables
 * Business development support:
 * Align calendars, schedule and prepare for BD meetings
 * Assist with proposal preparation, pitch decks, and follow-ups
 * Attend key meetings to take notes, track actionables, and ensure timely execution
 * People & culture:
 * Assist with end-to-end recruitment (job descriptions, scheduling, screening)
 * Coordinate with department heads on hiring and team structuring
 * Help nurture a positive and high-performance work culture
 * Strategic support:
 * Be the sounding board and right hand for the founders
 * Step in wherever needed—be it idea execution, campaign planning, or team coordination
   
   

About Company: Established in the year 2014, Framed is a Kolkata-based company providing photography & videography services across several domains. We started as an event & wedding photography company, and while we continue delivering masterpieces for our clients, our penchant for storytelling knows no barrier. This led to our association with brands and businesses that have a story to tell and the creation of our other wing - Framed Productions. Being a close-knit tribe of visual storytellers & creators, we are super passionate about the work we do. We're on the lookout for a passionate artist who is not afraid to dream big, challenge the status quo, and turn ideas into groundbreaking realities. If you're ready to ignite your passion and embark on a thrilling adventure, we'd love for you to be part of our family.

title: Sr Policy Analyst
description:
Company Description

Electro Plaza Projects [EPP] is a trusted leader in precision-grade IoT environmental monitoring solutions across India. Specializing in monitoring air, water, and noise pollution, EPP equips industries and government bodies with real-time data and insights to ensure compliance with CPHEEO, JJM, and CPCB standards. Our modular solutions integrate seamlessly with existing systems for efficient data analysis, enabling improved emergency response and regulatory compliance. With accredited sensors by National Physical Laboratory and other renowned institutions, EPP protects the environment by delivering reliable real-time intelligence across districts, serving over 100,000 rural households with 99.8% dashboard uptime. We are committed to empowering communities and organizations to safeguard vital resources.




Key Responsibilities

 * Conduct secondary research, literature reviews, and policy analysis.
 * Monitor fiscal allocations and regulatory shifts at the Central and State levels, aligning organizational strategy with India’s evolving mandates for water management, and security.
 * Assist in drafting reports, policy notes, presentations, and briefs for internal and external stakeholders.
 * Support the design of surveys, questionnaires, and basic evaluation instruments under senior guidance.
 * Support data collection, verification, and documentation for ongoing programmes.
 * Assist in monitoring and evaluation of projects aligned with SDG 6, 11, and 13 and relevant Indian regulatory frameworks (MoHUA, DDWS, MoJS, CPCB, etc.).
 * Contribute to impact assessments related to water, sanitation, urban development, and environmental sustainability initiatives.
 * Assist in developing and maintaining project tracking tools, databases, and dashboards.
 * Support coordination of capacity-building workshops and training programmes.
 * Help document best practices, case studies, and lessons learned.
 * Assist in preparing submissions for government agencies, donors, and development partners.
 * Support stakeholder engagement activities, including meetings, consultations, and partnerships.
 * Maintain organized records of project data, communications, and documentation.




Qualifications & Eligibility

 * Bachelor’s /Maters Degree in Public Policy, Economics, Environmental Science, Development Studies, Social Sciences.
 * Should demonstrate fluency in interpreting analysing and visualizing quantitative and qualitative data to generate actionable insights.
 * 0–2 years of relevant internship or work experience in research, development, consulting or governance-related roles.
 * Basic understanding of Indian government schemes and regulatory systems.
 * Strong written and verbal communication skills.
 * Proficiency in MS Office / Google Workspace (especially Excel, Word, and PowerPoint).
 * Good research, analytical, and documentation abilities.
 * Ability to work independently under guidance and meet deadlines.
 * Willingness to travel for fieldwork, if required.

title: Area Sales Executive (Ontrade) - Kolkata
description:
[Please note this is a Direct Search led by Bacardi, Applications from agencies will not be accepted nor will fees be paid for unsolicited CVs.]

YOUR OPPORTUNITY

Off-trade sales at Bacardi helps in generating the primary and secondary sales and build relationships with distributors and retailers. They play a critical role in the availability and launching our portfolio brands in the retail outlets.

They can do this by crafting a lot of activations, brand advocacy sessions for the distributors and retailers.

About You

We are looking for primos who want be part of our Family and want to develop their career in a dynamic team. You need to be results oriented looking to develop the business as a founder in your RTM with focus on growing our Premium portfolio and Innovations and protecting the Core business.

RESPONSIBILITIES - WITH OUR CONSUMER AT THE HEART YOUR KEY FOCUS WILL BE


 * Deliver results and excellence in execution
 * Deliver on key financial targets (NSV, Gross Margin, Overheads, Profitability, ROI, Value Share)
 * Deliver on Pictures of Success targets, complete survey and work in partnership with customers / distributor to deliver excellence in execution.
 * Achieving Volume Budget of the region
 * Achieve the Implementation of Marketing Activities like Promotions & Visibility
 * Activations and execution to be done in line with the marketing team
 * Ensure the availability of Bacardi Brands in line with the AVPQPAP drivers
 * Stay update-to-date with current and competitors’ trends to identify improvements or recommend new solutions
 * Collect and analyze information and prepare data and sales reports
 * Manage territory / channel / account performance on a monthly/quarterly basis, working with customers / distributors to ensure delivery of forecast and budget (volume / value / execution) in line with Bacardi Scorecard
 * Act as the leading customer contact, building effective long-term relationships with customers / distributors/ retailers
 * Communicate effectively with customers to seek inputs for product and service improvement and resolve day-to-day operational questions/issues
   
   

SKILLS - THE SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE NEEDED TO CREATE YOUR LEGACY


 * Skilled communicator with good presentation skills
 * Strong commercial acumen and knowledge of the region
 * Effective use of networking and interpersonal skills
 * Strong negotiation skills and first-hand field sales experience
   
   

The following experiences are preferred:


 * Experience in the Spirits and/or Beverage Industry is a distinct advantage
 * Proficiency in English & local language skills
   
   

PERSONAL QUALITIES – SHARE OUR FOUNDER’S PASSION AND ENTREPRENEURIAL FLAIR


 * You are Pro-active, Goal-oriented, and Passionate about delivering results and constantly seek to improve
 * You love the consumer. You create strong positive first impressions and easily build those into great relationships with customers
 * You demonstrate resilience by overcoming challenges and staying calm under pressure
 * You demonstrate entrepreneurial thinking, looking for new ways to achieve better results
   
   

LEADERSHIP AGILITY

At Bacardi we care deeply about finding brilliant talent who can bring the following personal attributes to help elevate our 3Fs: Fearless, Family, Founder culture to the next level.


 * Belonging: You have a strong capacity to create a culture of ‘Belonging’, where people feel appreciated for who they are, what they do, and who they can become
 * Self-Awareness: You have high levels of self-awareness, are reflective and know yourself well, understanding both your own strengths and weaknesses and your impact on others
 * People Agility: You bring a deep ability to understand and relate to people and navigate through tough situations to harness and multiply collective performance
 * Results Agility: You demonstrate consistent delivery of results in first-time situations by inspiring teams, exhibiting a presence that builds confidence in yourself and others.
 * Mental Agility: You can think critically to penetrate complex problems and expand the possibilities by making fresh connections. You think strategically whilst being execution focused and bring creativity to the challenges you’re presented with
 * Change Agility: You have a deep natural curiosity, desire to experiment and ability to effectively deal with the heat of change. You have a growth and learning mindset: ready to test, stumble, learn and apply from experience
   
   

Disclaimer: Bacardi seeks talent from all backgrounds to bring diversity of thought, agility and capability to our organization across the globe. We promote a working environment where all employees are treated and rewarded fairly. We do not tolerate any form of discrimination that adversely affects individuals or groups on the basis of national origin, race, color, religion, sex, gender, sexual orientation, marital status, disability, age, and any other legally protected aspect of a person’s identity.

U.S. applicants have rights under Federal Employment Laws.

Perks of Working for us

At Bacardi, we are committed to providing our Primos (employees) with a comprehensive Total Rewards package of compensation, benefits, incentives, allowances, well-being, and much more to meet the needs of themselves and their families. It goes beyond just Cash! The total rewards program is based on pay for performance, whereby the incentive programs are linked to company and individual performance.

Compensation, Paid Time Off & Retirement:


 * Competitive Pay Package
 * Competitive Holiday/Paid Time Off, plus additional days offered ( i.e., volunteer day, allowing you to give back to the community)
 * Retirement/Pension Plan
   
   

Health & Wellbeing


 * Medical, Critical Illness, and Life Insurance
 * Calm Meditation App subscription (free)
 * Employee Assistance Programs
 * Best-in-class, family-friendly, and inclusive leave policies
   
   

Additional Benefits

The benefits /perks may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Bacardi, your work location, and are subject to change.

Some benefits may be subject to an employee contribution.

Some benefits may be fully or partially subsidized. Incentive plans are linked to the nature of your employment and can vary based on region, market, function or brand.

It goes beyond just Cash! The total rewards program is based on pay for performance, whereby the incentive programs are linked to company and individual performance.

Compensation, Paid Time Off & Retirement:

  • Competitive Pay Package
  • Competitive Holiday/Paid Time Off, plus additional days offered ( i.e., volunteer day, allowing you to give back to the community)
  • Retirement/Pension Plan

Health & Wellbeing

  • Medical, Critical Illness, and Life Insurance
  • Calm Meditation App subscription (free)
  • Employee Assistance Programs
  • Best-in-class, family-friendly, and inclusive leave policies

Additional Benefits

The benefits /perks may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Bacardi, your work location, and are subject to change.

Some benefits may be subject to an employee contribution.

Some benefits may be fully or partially subsidized. Incentive plans are linked to the nature of your employment and can vary based on region, market, function or brand.

title: Talent Acquisition Executive HR
description:
Why work at Digitex?

Join Digitex Technologies, a London-based company, and take your career to the next level. We are looking for a skilled HR Executive who worked for Web Development and Digital Marketing Industry at our Kolkata Office at Salt lake Sector 5.

We're a people-centric company, driven by our core values - diversity, equality and inclusion. We invest in their growth and wellbeing by providing work-life-balance through work from home set-up.

Role & Responsibilities


 * End-to-end recruitment for BDE (Business Development Executive) roles
 * Handle bulk and urgent hiring requirements for UK and USA clients
 * Source candidates through job portals, LinkedIn, referrals, and other channels
 * Screen resumes, conduct initial HR interviews, and assess communication skills
 * Coordinate with hiring managers and schedule interviews
 * Ensure timely closures while maintaining candidate quality
 * Maintain recruitment trackers and provide regular hiring updates
 * Build a strong pipeline of BDE candidates for ongoing requirements
   
   

Required Skills & Experience


 * 1–2 years of experience in Non-IT recruitment
 * Proven experience in BDE / Sales hiring
 * Excellent English communication skills (verbal & written)
 * Experience hiring for international process / overseas clients is a strong advantage
 * Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines
 * Kolkata candidate preferred
   
   

Perks And Benefits


 * 5 days working
 * Paid Sick leave
 * Competitive salary package
 * Fixed working hours
 * Weekly fun friday to boost team bonding

title: Graphic Designer in Kolkata
description:
We’re on the lookout for a Graphic Designer who lives and breathes design — someone who understands the power of visuals and knows how to translate stories into striking compositions. If you notice typography on street signs, can’t help but balance elements on your plate (or in your posters), and genuinely care about getting the alignment just right — you’ll feel at home here.

What You’ll Be Doing


 * Work closely with our creative leads to design boutique photo albums that double up as timeless
   
   

heirlooms.


 * Create social media creatives (feed + stories) that feel fresh, intentional, and aligned with our brand
   
   

language.


 * Design posters, video thumbnails, and campaign visuals that grab attention and convey meaning
   
   

without shouting.


 * Help define and implement brand guidelines across all digital assets and ensure consistency in
   
   

everything we put out.

What We’re Looking For


 * Comfort with tools like Photoshop, Illustrator, Canva — and a love for learning newer, better ways to
   
   

design.


 * A strong sense of layout, colour palettes, fonts, and whitespace.
 * A portfolio that reflects range — from clean minimalism to festive maximalism.
 * Someone who communicates clearly, loves collaboration, and is open to feedback.
   
   

About Company: Established in the year 2014, Framed is a Kolkata-based company providing photography & videography services across several domains. We started as an event & wedding photography company, and while we continue delivering masterpieces for our clients, our penchant for storytelling knows no barrier. This led to our association with brands and businesses that have a story to tell and the creation of our other wing - Framed Productions. Being a close-knit tribe of visual storytellers & creators, we are super passionate about the work we do. We're on the lookout for a passionate artist who is not afraid to dream big, challenge the status quo, and turn ideas into groundbreaking realities. If you're ready to ignite your passion and embark on a thrilling adventure, we'd love for you to be part of our family.

title: Mechanical Engineer - Delivery
description:
SLB's technology development teams turn groundbreaking ideas into tangible solutions that transform the way our customers operate. Our engineers redefine their discipline, spearheading development across mechanics, modeling, electronics, and robotics. Leveraging a delivery excellence mindset, our product development engineers work hand in hand with manufacturing, quality, and supply chain experts to design and execute manufacturing plans with unparalleled precision and flexibility. Together, these squads ensure that leading-edge technology makes it out of the design phase and into the hands of global energy operators. Our teams explore the intersections of data science, maintenance, and operations alongside our digital technology and technology lifecycle management experts, coming together to form a continuous loop of innovation.

Looking for adventure? In addition to more traditional roles, our Tech and Field program is home to an elite group of individuals with advanced technical expertise and strong engineering skills. If you have a blend of energy, knowledge, and leadership, it’s time to put them to action in a program that redefines “hands-on” experience.

Qualifications

See minimum qualifications for these and related positions.

Here are some of the roles that contribute to our technology development teams:


 * Design Engineer
 * Chemical Engineer
 * Electrical Engineer
 * Manufacturing Engineer
 * Mechanical Engineer
 * Physicist
 * Research Scientist
